name: JS-Setup
prompt: Generate ONLY JavaScript code for setup. Get canvas fire-canvas, get 2d context, set canvas width and height to window inner dimensions. Add resize listener. Create config object: intensity 0.7, windStrength 0.3, buoyancy 0.6, heatIntensity 0.8, sparkRate 0.5. Create empty particles array and empty sparks array. Add perlinNoise function: function noise(x,y,time){const s=x*12.9898+y*78.233+time*43.758; return (Math.sin(s)*43758.5453)%1;}

name: JS-FlameParticle
prompt: Generate ONLY JavaScript code for FlameParticle class. Class FlameParticle constructor(x,y,temp): this.x=x, this.y=y, this.baseY=y, this.vx=random -0.5 to 0.5, this.vy=random -3 to -5, this.temp=temp, this.age=0, this.maxAge=random 40 to 80, this.width=random 8 to 16, this.height=random 20 to 40. Method update(): age++, vy minus= config.buoyancy times 0.08, temp times= 0.97, apply noise for flicker: const flicker=noise(x times 0.05,y times 0.05,Date.now() times 0.001) minus 0.5, vx plus= flicker times 0.3, width plus= flicker times 2, x plus= vx, y plus= vy, vx times= 0.98. Method draw(ctx): calculate gradient alpha=(1 minus age/maxAge), create gradient from x,y to x,y plus height, add color stops: 0=white alpha 0.9, 0.3=yellow alpha 0.7, 0.6=orange alpha 0.5, 1=red alpha 0.2, set fillStyle to gradient, draw ellipse using beginPath moveTo arc arc closePath fill. Method isDead(): return age greater than maxAge or temp less than 300.

name: JS-Spark
prompt: Generate ONLY JavaScript code for Spark class. Class Spark constructor(x,y): this.x=x, this.y=y, this.vx=random -2 to 2, this.vy=random -4 to -6, this.size=random 1 to 3, this.brightness=random 0.7 to 1, this.life=random 30 to 60, this.trail=[]. Method update(): vy plus= 0.05 (gravity), x plus= vx, y plus= vy, vx times= 0.99, life minus minus, trail.push({x:x,y:y}), if trail.length greater than 5 trail.shift(). Method draw(ctx): trail.forEach with alpha fade, draw trail dots, set shadowBlur=10, shadowColor=orange, fillStyle=rgba(255,200,100,brightness), draw circle at x,y radius size. Method isDead(): return life less or equal 0.

name: JS-Physics
prompt: Generate ONLY JavaScript code for spawn and update functions. Function spawnFlame(x,y): if x undefined x=random canvas.width, if y undefined y=canvas.height, temp=random 1200 to 1800, particles.push new FlameParticle(x,y,temp). Function spawnSpark(x,y): if random less than config.sparkRate times 0.01, sparks.push new Spark(x,y). Function updateParticles(): loop particles backwards, call update(), if isDead() remove with splice. Function updateSparks(): same for sparks. Function spawnContinuous(): count=Math.floor(config.intensity times 3), for i to count: xPos=canvas.width/2 plus random -50 to 50, spawnFlame(xPos, canvas.height), if random less than 0.3 spawnSpark(xPos, canvas.height). setInterval spawnContinuous every 50ms.

name: JS-Rendering
prompt: Generate ONLY JavaScript code for render loop and effects. Variable fps=60, lastTime=performance.now(), particleCountDisplay. Function render(): now=performance.now(), fps=Math.round(1000/(now minus lastTime)), lastTime=now, fillStyle='rgba(0,0,0,0.15)', fillRect clear canvas, call updateParticles() and updateSparks(), sort particles by y descending for depth, forEach particle call draw(ctx), forEach spark call draw(ctx), update FPS counter textContent, update particle count textContent with particles.length, requestAnimationFrame(render). Call render() to start.

name: JS-Controls
prompt: Generate ONLY JavaScript code for UI controls. Function updateSliderDisplay(id,value): document.getElementById(id plus '-val').textContent=value. For each slider id (intensity,wind,buoyancy,heat,sparks): add input event listener, get value, update config property, call updateSliderDisplay. Canvas click event: spawn 15 flames at clientX clientY, spawn 10 sparks at same position. Preset buttons: candle sets intensity 0.3 wind 0.1 buoyancy 0.4, campfire sets 0.5 0.2 0.6, torch sets 0.6 0.4 0.7, bonfire sets 0.8 0.3 0.7, inferno sets 1.0 0.6 0.9. Each preset updates slider values and displays. Console.log 'Realistic Fire Simulator loaded. Click to spawn flames!'
